meanings.definition: A mountain peak that is at least 14,000 feet high.
meanings.sent1: The climbers were excited to conquer the challenging fourteeners in Colorado.
meanings.sent2: Colorado is famous for its many fourteeners, attracting hikers and adventurers.
meanings.sent3: The fourteeners in the distance seemed to be playing hide and seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: The fourteeners stood tall like ancient guardians of the land.
meanings.sent5: The snow-capped fourteeners sparkled in the morning sun, beckoning explorers.

meanings.definition: A group of mountains that are all at least 14,000 feet high.
meanings.sent1: The range of fourteeners in the Rockies offers stunning views of the valleys below.
meanings.sent2: Explorers planned their route to summit all the fourteeners in the area.
meanings.sent3: The fourteeners huddled together like a group of friends sharing secrets.
meanings.sent4: The vast expanse of the fourteeners resembled a sleeping giant on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the maze of fourteeners required careful planning and determination.
